title: Triple crossbow
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| Name                                           | Triple crossbow                                    |
| :--------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------- |
| Skill                                          | [Ranged Weapons](/Ranged_Weapons "Ranged Weapons") |
| [Damage](/Weapon_damage "Weapon damage")       | 23                                                 |
| Accuracy                                       | -2                                                 |
| [Base delay](/Weapon_speed "Weapon speed") (%) | 23                                                 |
| [Min delay](/Minimum_delay "Minimum delay")    | 10 at 26 skill                                     |
| [Hands](/Handedness "Handedness")              | 2H                                                 |
| Size                                           | Medium                                             |
| Ranged?                                        | Yes                                                |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A crossbow with three strings arranged in series to provide exceptional power, initially designed as a siege weapon and then scaled down. It takes a considerable amount of time to load and fire.***"Energy may be likened to the bending of a crossbow; decision, to the releasing of a trigger."-Sun Tzu |

> This weapon falls into the '[Ranged Weapons](/Ranged_Weapons "Ranged Weapons")' category. It is a two-handed weapon

The **triple crossbow** is a phenomenally powerful [ranged weapon](/Ranged_weapon "Ranged weapon"); at 23 base damage, it has the highest base damage of *any* weapon in the game. However, it's also one of the slowest weapons in the game: with a base delay of 2.3, it takes a whopping 26 skill in [Ranged Weapons](/Ranged_Weapons "Ranged Weapons") to reduce its attack speed to its mindelay of 1.0.

Until you get close to that point, you'll likely get much better performance out of a [longbow](/Longbow "Longbow") or a well enchanted [arbalest](/Arbalest "Arbalest"). Once you reach those near-max skill levels, however, there is little reason not to upgrade.

|                                | Image                                                                                    |
| ------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **Mundane**                    | [![Triple crossbow.png](/images/1/1d/Triple_crossbow.png)](/File:Triple_crossbow.png)    |
| **Magical**                    | [![Triple crossbow2.png](/images/1/1c/Triple_crossbow2.png)](/File:Triple_crossbow2.png) |
|                                | [Unrandart](/Unrandart "Unrandart") triple crossbow                                      |
| **[Sniper](/Sniper "Sniper")** | [![New sniper.png](/images/5/55/New_sniper.png)](/File:New_sniper.png)                   |

## History

- In [0.29](/0.29 "0.29"), stats of the triple crossbow were changed (damage from 22 to 23, accuracy from 0 to -2), and they were affected by the [ranged weapons rework](/Ranged_Weapons#History "Ranged Weapons") that applied to all launchers, including the removal of the dedicated [crossbows skill](/Crossbows_\(skill\) "Crossbows (skill)") and physical [bolts](/Bolt "Bolt") necessary to fire. [Spriggans](/Spriggan "Spriggan") also lost the ability to wield them.
- Triple crossbows (as well as [hand crossbows](/Hand_crossbow "Hand crossbow") and [arbalests](/Arbalest "Arbalest")) were added in [0.15](/0.15 "0.15"), replacing vanilla [crossbows](/Crossbow_\(item\) "Crossbow (item)").

| [Weapons](/Weapon "Weapon")                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| ---------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Axes](/Axes "Axes")                                 | [Battleaxe](/Battleaxe "Battleaxe") • [Broad axe](/Broad_axe "Broad axe") • [Executioner's axe](/Executioner%27s_axe "Executioner's axe") • [Hand axe](/Hand_axe "Hand axe") • [War axe](/War_axe "War axe")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [Maces & Flails](/Maces_%26_Flails "Maces & Flails") | [Club](/Club "Club") • [Demon whip](/Demon_whip "Demon whip") • [Dire flail](/Dire_flail "Dire flail") • [Eveningstar](/Eveningstar "Eveningstar") • [Flail](/Flail "Flail") • [Giant club](/Giant_club "Giant club") • [Giant spiked club](/Giant_spiked_club "Giant spiked club") • [Great mace](/Great_mace "Great mace") • [Mace](/Mace "Mace") ([Hammer](/Hammer "Hammer")) • [Morningstar](/Morningstar "Morningstar") • [Sacred scourge](/Sacred_scourge "Sacred scourge") • [Whip](/Whip "Whip") |
| [Long Blades](/Long_Blades "Long Blades")            | [Demon blade](/Demon_blade "Demon blade") • [Double sword](/Double_sword "Double sword") • [Eudemon blade](/Eudemon_blade "Eudemon blade") • [Falchion](/Falchion "Falchion") • [Great sword](/Great_sword "Great sword") • [Long sword](/Long_sword "Long sword") • [Scimitar](/Scimitar "Scimitar") • [Triple sword](/Triple_sword "Triple sword")                                                                                                                                                     |
| [Polearms](/Polearms "Polearms")                     | [Bardiche](/Bardiche "Bardiche") • [Demon trident](/Demon_trident "Demon trident") • [Glaive](/Glaive "Glaive") • [Halberd](/Halberd "Halberd") ([Scythe](/Scythe "Scythe")) • [Spear](/Spear "Spear") • [Trident](/Trident "Trident") • [Trishula](/Trishula "Trishula")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [Ranged Weapons](/Ranged_Weapons "Ranged Weapons")   | [Arbalest](/Arbalest "Arbalest") • [Hand cannon](/Hand_cannon "Hand cannon") • [Longbow](/Longbow "Longbow") • [Orcbow](/Orcbow "Orcbow") • [Shortbow](/Shortbow "Shortbow") • [Sling](/Sling "Sling") • [Triple crossbow]()                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [Short Blades](/Short_Blades "Short Blades")         | [Dagger](/Dagger "Dagger") • [Quick blade](/Quick_blade "Quick blade") • [Rapier](/Rapier "Rapier") • [Short sword](/Short_sword "Short sword")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [Staves](/Staves "Staves")                           | [Lajatang](/Lajatang "Lajatang") • [Magical staff](/Magical_staff "Magical staff") • [Quarterstaff](/Quarterstaff "Quarterstaff")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [Throwing](/Throwing "Throwing")                     | [Boomerang](/Boomerang "Boomerang") • [Dart](/Dart "Dart") • [Javelin](/Javelin "Javelin") • [Large rock](/Large_rock "Large rock") • [Stone](/Stone "Stone") • [Throwing net](/Throwing_net "Throwing net")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
html:
Triple crossbow

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Name Triple crossbow
Skill Ranged Weapons
Damage 23
Accuracy -2
Base delay (%) 23
Min delay 10 at 26 skill
Hands 2H
Size Medium
Ranged? Yes


A crossbow with three strings arranged in series to provide exceptional power, initially designed as a siege weapon and then scaled down. It takes a considerable amount of time to load and fire.

"Energy may be likened to the bending of a crossbow;
decision, to the releasing of a trigger."

-Sun Tzu

This weapon falls into the 'Ranged Weapons' category. It is a two-handed weapon

The triple crossbow is a phenomenally powerful ranged weapon; at 23 base damage, it has the highest base damage of any weapon in the game. However, it's also one of the slowest weapons in the game: with a base delay of 2.3, it takes a whopping 26 skill in Ranged Weapons to reduce its attack speed to its mindelay of 1.0.

Until you get close to that point, you'll likely get much better performance out of a longbow or a well enchanted arbalest. Once you reach those near-max skill levels, however, there is little reason not to upgrade.

Image
Mundane
Magical
Unrandart
triple crossbow
Sniper

History

  • In 0.29, stats of the triple crossbow were changed (damage from 22 to 23, accuracy from 0 to -2), and they were affected by the ranged weapons rework that applied to all launchers, including the removal of the dedicated crossbows skill and physical bolts necessary to fire. Spriggans also lost the ability to wield them.
  • Triple crossbows (as well as hand crossbows and arbalests) were added in 0.15, replacing vanilla crossbows.
Weapons
Axes Battleaxe • Broad axe • Executioner's axe • Hand axe • War axe
Maces & Flails Club • Demon whip • Dire flail • Eveningstar • Flail • Giant club • Giant spiked club • Great mace • Mace (Hammer) • Morningstar • Sacred scourge • Whip
Long Blades Demon blade • Double sword • Eudemon blade • Falchion • Great sword • Long sword • Scimitar • Triple sword
Polearms Bardiche • Demon trident • Glaive • Halberd (Scythe) • Spear • Trident • Trishula
Ranged Weapons Arbalest • Hand cannon • Longbow • Orcbow • Shortbow • Sling • Triple crossbow
Short Blades Dagger • Quick blade • Rapier • Short sword
Staves Lajatang • Magical staff • Quarterstaff
Throwing Boomerang • Dart • Javelin • Large rock • Stone • Throwing net
